column5: Looks like a recovery in progress for an Ottawa man that just had to try skipping his sled across the lake. https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=10&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwicpNWn7_DeAhVitlkKHfD9CbMQFjAJegQIBhAB&url=https%3A%2F%2Fottawa.ctvnews.ca%2Fopp-searching-for-missing-snowmobiler-1.4191698&usg=AOvVaw2tmlGnY3uTzcIsixtUOwzt
Reading those always makes me feel bad and frustrated at the same time. Hope they find him at a buddy's house or something.
What a waste. Thoughts go to his family.
I actually saw snowmobile tracks on Pigeon Lake on the weekend when the snow was melting. So sad to hear that someone so young lost their life.
2 guys ice fishing on sturgeon near Emily creek. On.Saturday
